title: Caballete and Berenjena
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Fusion, Latin American, Colombian
description: Vegetarian restaurant in the Santa Barbara neighborhood turned vegan in 2015. Located a block west from Carrera 7. Originally founded in 2011 as delivery only and now has a full-fledged restaurant with a large menu including both fast food and proper main dishes.
